'''Efficacy Testing Simulation Arena''' is part of the [[Mega Meka Melee]] event during [[Version 4.0]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Mega Meka Melee Efficacy Testing Simulation Arena 1.png
|text1  = During the "Efficacy Testing Simulation Arena" challenge, Travelers need to proceed to the designated areas and defeat all enemies.<br>Each challenge has 3 different areas occupied by opponents. Clear all opponents in each area to complete the challenge.
}}

==Stages==
===I: Replica Tactic===
{{Description|"Accurately analyze the opponent's current state and then adopt the most efficient tactics, so as to effectively deal with hordes of diverse enemies." This is indeed one of the keys to simulating the might of a Champion Duelist. Only in this way can one gain an early advantage in battle and emerge victorious against a greater number of forces.|Map Marker Description}}
Unlocks 2023-08-24 10{{Colon}}00

===III: Combat Recreation===
{{Description|"Come up with infallible strategies before battle, pursue full implementation with ample cautiousness amidst battle, and clean up the surroundings after battle." With data and experience obtained from the two previous simulations, once the segments comprising this chain of battle are fully perfected, one should be capable of recreating the might of a Champion Duelist soon enough!|Map Marker Description}}
Unlocks 2023-08-28 04{{Colon}}00
